Articles.Content:
Hello everyone. I picked up KSP during the Steam Summer sale and I'm really enjoying it. It's also incredibly frustrating at times too but I'm really getting value for money out of it. 45 hours spent so far, managed to get to the Mun and Minmus, hopefully get to Duna once I get these interplanetary transfers figured out and yes I have watched Scott Manley's video on it but it doesn't help because he knows what he's doing and I don't.

Edited July 9, 2014 by Jade Falcon
Welcome! Don't worry about being frustrated, once you get the hang of the game it's very rewarding! And also, only 45 hours and you've already gone to the Mun and Minmus? Very quick progress!
@Javster. Thanks. Yeah the game is great but I think I want to run before I can walk which is the problem.
